dmca.title: DMCA Notice: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
EN

 

 

-----Original Message-----
From: Piracy - Online [mailto:Piracy-Online@ea.com] 
Sent: Thursday, November 11, 2004 12:54 PM
To: legal@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Notice: Copyright Infringement
Importance: High

 

Picture (Metafile)

November 11, 2004 

Re:    DMCA Notice: Copyright Infringement 

SENT VIA E-MAIL 

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

ATTN: Lance Crosby, ESQ
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207                

 

Re:     Electronic Arts Trademark and Copyright Infringement Notice

 

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter is to notify you, pursuant to the provisions of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"), that we believe a computer being hosted
by your company at IP address: 69.56.168.245 is infringing Electronic Arts
Inc. copyrighted materials. Specifically, Electronic Arts Inc. ("EA") is the
owner of copyrights for the PC computer game: Need for Speed Underground 2.
The following IRC XDCC bot is hosted by ThePlanet.com Internet Services,
Inc. and offers an unauthorized downloadable version of this EA game. The
infringing material may be found at:

IP Address: 69.56.168.245
IRC Bot Name: Rapeus-015
Network: irc.zippertrout.org
Channel Name: #rapeus
File Name Description: Need.for.Speed.Underground.2-RELOADED.tar
Date First Seen: Thu Nov 11 10:43:45 2004 
Date Last Seen: Thu Nov 11 10:43:45 2004


The unauthorized activity by the aforementioned site constitutes
infringement of EA's intellectual property rights.  Accordingly, EA demands
that ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. IMMEDIATELY DELETE AND/OR DISABLE
ACCESS to the IRC bot located at IP 69.56.168.245 and REMOVE ITS CONTENTS
FROM VIEW. 

Should you have any questions, please contact the undersigned at: 

Sacha Tarrant

Online Piracy Specialist

EA Law - Intellectual Property Enforcement

Electronic Arts Inc.

piracy-online@ea.com

 

I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained
of is not authorized by Electronic Arts Inc., its agents or the law, and
that the information in this notice is accurate. I declare under penalty of
perjury under the laws of the United States of America that I am authorized
to act on behalf of Electronic Arts Inc.

 

Picture (Metafile)

Sacha Tarrant

Online Piracy Specialist

EA Law - Intellectual Property Enforcement

Electronic Arts Inc.

915 - 118th Avenue SE
Bellevue, WA  98005

piracy-online@ea.com
dmca.principal_name: EA Law - Intellectual Property Enforcement (for Electronic Arts Inc.)
